headline.main: Review: ‘Pride and Prejudice and Zombies’; More Tea, Dear?

docs.snippet: In this undead ravishing of the Jane Austen novel, Elizabeth Bennet must deal with creatures much, much worse than Mr. Darcy....
docs.abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews movie Pride and Prejudice and Zombies, adapted from Seth Grahame-Smith novel by Burr Steers, who also directs; Lily James and Sam Riley star.
docs.lead_paragraph: In this undead ravishing of the Jane Austen novel, Elizabeth Bennet must deal with creatures much, much worse than Mr. Darcy.

headline.main: Panthers Win 5th Straight by Beating Red Wings 6-3

headline.main: European Parliament Calls for Release of Hong Kong Booksellers
headline.print_headline: European Parliament Calls for Release of Hong Kong Booksellers

docs.snippet: HONG KONG - The European Parliament has called for the immediate release of five Hong Kong booksellers detained in China, in a case that has grabbed global headlines and rattled the diplomatic and business community in the Asia financial centre....
docs.lead_paragraph: HONG KONG - The European Parliament has called for the immediate release of five Hong Kong booksellers detained in China, in a case that has grabbed global headlines and rattled the diplomatic and business community in the Asia financial centre.

headline.main: Capitals' Ovechkin Scores Winner in Return vs. Islanders
headline.print_headline: Capitals' Ovechkin Scores Winner in Return vs. Islanders

docs.snippet: Braden Holtby began feeling like he was playing the first game after a summer off, and Alex Ovechkin needed a few shifts to get back into a rhythm. Once they got going, the Washington Capitals were back to normal....

headline.main: Review: ‘Eisenstein in Guanajuato’ Explores 10 Days That Changed a Filmmaker’s Life and Work
headline.print_headline: A Filmmaker’s Life-Changing Trip, at Least Until It’s Time to Return Home

docs.snippet: This comedic fantasy from Peter Greenaway about Sergei Eisenstein’s trip to Mexico in the 1930s quotes Eisenstein at length, while imagining a scandalous personal life....

docs.lead_paragraph: This comedic fantasy from Peter Greenaway about Sergei Eisenstein’s trip to Mexico in the 1930s quotes Eisenstein at length, while imagining a scandalous personal life.
